Name: Four Leaf Clover
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: MUDDLE clove in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Originally based on vodka but seemed a shame not to try it as a Daiquiri.
History: Created in 2008 by Denis Broci at Maze bar & Restaurant, London, England.
